inputs.name: connectionSource
inputs.label: Service connection source

inputs.name: jfrogPlatformConnection
inputs.label: JFrog Platform service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: JFrog Platform service connection to use in the command.

inputs.name: xrayConnection

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory.
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory where the command will run. When empty, the value of '$(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)' is used.

inputs.name: watchesSource
inputs.label: Xray Watches Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choose the source to obtain Xray watches, to determine Xray's violations creation.

inputs.name: watches
inputs.label: Xray watches list
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma separated list of Xray watches, to determine Xray's violations creation.

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Artifactory Project key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Artifactory project key that contains the build info.

inputs.name: repo-path
inputs.label: Repository path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target repo path, to enable Xray to determine watches accordingly.

inputs.name: allowFailBuild

inputs.helpMarkDown: Uncheck if you do not wish to fail the build if Xray scan matches a rule with 'Fail Build' action.
